title: Bug 2296AddBookmarkAction should use IAdaptable to retrieve the resource (1GEN8B7)
description: Bug 2296AddBookmarkAction should use IAdaptable to retrieve the resource (1GEN8B7)
EB: As all other actions AddBookmarkAction should use IAdaptable to retrieve the IFile from the selection so that it can be reused inother navigators like packages view too.NOTES:
